phenomedb.analysisÔÉÅ

class phenomedb.analysis.AnalysisTask(query_factory=None, saved_query_model='AnnotatedFeature', saved_query_id=None, task_run_id=None, username=None, correction_type=None, exclude_na_metadata_samples=False, exclude_na_metadata_columns=False, output_dir=None, db_env=None, db_session=None, execution_date=None, columns_to_exclude=None, exclude_one_factor_columns=False, columns_to_include=None, class_level=None, class_type=None, only_harmonised_metadata=False, only_metadata=False, scaling=None, transform=None, reload_cache=False, validate=True, aggregate_function=None, harmonise_annotations=False, upstream_task_run_id=None, exclude_samples_with_na_feature_values=False, include_metadata=False, exclude_features_with_na_feature_values=False, include_default_columns=True, include_harmonised_metadata=True, drop_sample_column=False, exclude_features_not_in_all_projects=False, sample_types=None, assay_roles=None, pipeline_run_id=None)ÔÉÅ

The base AnalysisTask Task. Extend this Task to create your own methods.

Parameters:

  • query_factory (phenomedb.query_factory.QueryFactory, optional) ‚Äì QueryFactory, a handle to the phenomedb.query_factory.QueryFactory object that defined the cohort, defaults to None

  • saved_query_model (str, optional) ‚Äì The output model of the query, defaults to ‚ÄòAnnotatedFeature‚Äô

  • saved_query_id (int, optional) ‚Äì SavedQuery.id of the query, (typical usage), defaults to None

  • task_run_id (int, optional) ‚Äì The TaskRun.id, defaults to None

  • username (str, optional) ‚Äì The username of the user running the task, defaults to None

  • correction_type (str, optional) ‚Äì The CorrectionType to pass to the Query (e.g. SR, LTR), defaults to None

  • exclude_na_metadata_samples (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to exclude samples that have na values for their metadata columns, defaults to False

  • exclude_na_metadata_columns (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to exclude metadata columns that have na values, defaults to False

  • output_dir (str, optional) ‚Äì Output directory for function, defaults to None

  • db_env (str, optional) ‚Äì Database environment, ‚ÄòPROD‚Äô,‚ÄôBETA‚Äô,‚ÄôTEST‚Äô, defaults to None

  • db_session (object, optional) ‚Äì Database session, defaults to None

  • execution_date (DateTime.DateTime, optional) ‚Äì Datetime of execution, defaults to None

  • columns_to_exclude (list, optional) ‚Äì Which columns to exclude, defaults to None

  • exclude_one_factor_columns (bool, optional) ‚Äì Exclude columns with only one factor, defaults to False

  • columns_to_include (list, optional) ‚Äì Which columns to include, defaults to None

  • class_level (str, optional) ‚Äì Query Aggregration class level (for Compounds), defaults to None

  • class_type (str, optional) ‚Äì Query Aggregration class type, defaults to None

  • only_harmonised_metadata (bool, optional) ‚Äì Only include harmonised metadata fields, defaults to False

  • only_metadata (bool, optional) ‚Äì Only include metadata fields, defaults to False

  • scaling (str, optional) ‚Äì Which scaling to use, ‚Äòpa‚Äô, ‚Äòuv‚Äô, ‚Äòmed‚Äô, defaults to None

  • transform (str, optional) ‚Äì Which transformation to use, ‚Äòlog‚Äô, ‚Äòsqrt‚Äô, defaults to None

  • reload_cache (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to reload the cache for the Query, defaults to False

  • validate (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to validate the Task by running the validate() method, defaults to True

  • aggregate_function (str, optional) ‚Äì Which Query aggregration function to use (mean, median, sum, avg), defaults to None

  • harmonise_annotations (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to use harmonised annotations, defaults to False

  • upstream_task_run_id (int, optional) ‚Äì The upstream TaskRun.id, defaults to None

  • exclude_samples_with_na_feature_values (bool, optional) ‚Äì Exclude samples with na feature values, defaults to False

  • include_metadata (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to include metadata or not, defaults to False

  • exclude_features_with_na_feature_values (bool, optional) ‚Äì Exclude features with na feature values, defaults to False

  • include_default_columns (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to include default columns, defaults to True

  • include_harmonised_metadata (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to include harmonised metadata, defaults to True

  • drop_sample_column (bool, optional) ‚Äì Drop the sample column, defaults to False

  • exclude_features_not_in_all_projects (bool, optional) ‚Äì Exclude features not in all projects, defaults to False

  • sample_types (list, optional) ‚Äì SampleTypes to include (StudySample, StudyReference, ExternalReference), defaults to None

  • assay_roles (list, optional) ‚Äì AssayRoles to include (Assay, LinearityReference, PrecisionReference), defaults to None

  • pipeline_run_id (int, optional) ‚Äì The TaskRun.pipeline_run_id, defaults to None

load_data()ÔÉÅ

Load data method. Takes the query factory or saved_query_id and loads the dataframes

Raises:

Exception ‚Äì If no QueryFactory or SavedQuery object

process()ÔÉÅ

Main process method. Runs load_data(), run_analysis(), save_results()

run_analysis()ÔÉÅ

Runs the analysis. Override this method

save_results()ÔÉÅ

Save the results into AnalysisResult database table

class phenomedb.analysis.NPYCTask(query_factory=None, saved_query_model='AnnotatedFeature', saved_query_id=None, task_run_id=None, username=None, correction_type=None, exclude_na_metadata_samples=False, exclude_na_metadata_columns=False, output_dir=None, db_env=None, db_session=None, execution_date=None, columns_to_exclude=None, exclude_one_factor_columns=False, columns_to_include=None, class_level=None, class_type=None, only_harmonised_metadata=False, only_metadata=False, scaling=None, transform=None, reload_cache=False, validate=True, aggregate_function=None, harmonise_annotations=False, upstream_task_run_id=None, exclude_samples_with_na_feature_values=False, include_metadata=False, exclude_features_with_na_feature_values=False, include_default_columns=True, include_harmonised_metadata=True, drop_sample_column=False, exclude_features_not_in_all_projects=False, sample_types=None, assay_roles=None, pipeline_run_id=None)ÔÉÅ

Main process method. Runs load_data(), run_analysis(), save_results()

class phenomedb.analysis.RAnalysisTask(query_factory=None, saved_query_id=None, username=None, task_run_id=None, scaling=None, transform=None, db_env=None, db_session=None, execution_date=None, exclude_na_metadata_samples=False, exclude_na_metadata_columns=False, reload_cache=False, columns_to_include=None, columns_to_exclude=None, exclude_one_factor_columns=True, only_harmonised_metadata=True, only_metadata=False, drop_sample_column=False, class_level=None, aggregate_function=None, class_type=None, saved_query_model='AnnotatedFeature', correction_type=None, harmonise_annotations=False, upstream_task_run_id=None, exclude_samples_with_na_feature_values=False, include_metadata=False, exclude_features_with_na_feature_values=False, include_default_columns=True, include_harmonised_metadata=True, exclude_features_not_in_all_projects=False, sample_types=None, assay_roles=None, pipeline_run_id=None)ÔÉÅ
run_analysis()ÔÉÅ

Runs the analysis. Override this method

class phenomedb.analysis.RunMWAS(query_factory=None, saved_query_id=None, username=None, task_run_id=None, comment=None, model_Y_variable=None, model_X_variables=None, reload_cache=False, method='linear', correction_type=None, scaling=None, transform=None, upstream_task_run_id=None, pipeline_run_id=None, include_harmonised_metadata=True, db_env=None, db_session=None, execution_date=None, multiple_correction='BH', features_to_include=None, bootstrap=False, save_models=False, exclude_features_not_in_all_projects=True, harmonise_annotations=True, model_Y_ci=None, model_Y_min=None, model_Y_max=None)ÔÉÅ

Run an MWAS analysis. Uses the R package MWASTools :link:`https://www.bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/html/MWASTools.html`

Parameters:

  • model_Y_variable (str) ‚Äì The output variable to measure association against, for example h_metadata::Age for the harmonised age

  • model_X_variables (str) ‚Äì Covariates for the test of association

  • method ‚Äì Which association method to use, one of: linear, logistic, pearson, spearman, kendall

  • correction_method (str) ‚Äì Which multiple-testing correction to use, one of: bonferroni, benjamin-hochberg,

  • model_Y_ci (float) ‚Äì A confidence interval value to limit the range of Y valued samples to include (e.g. 0.95)

  • model_Y_min (float) ‚Äì The minimum range value of Y to include (eg. 20)

  • model_Y_max (boolean) ‚Äì The maximum range value of Y to include (eg 80)

  • bootstrap (boolean) ‚Äì Whether to run bootstrapping (takes a long time) default False

  • bootstrap ‚Äì Whether to save the models as well as the summary statistics/coefficients, default False

  • query_factory (phenomedb.query_factory.QueryFactory, optional) ‚Äì QueryFactory, a handle to the phenomedb.query_factory.QueryFactory object that defined the cohort, defaults to None

  • saved_query_model (str, optional) ‚Äì The output model of the query, defaults to ‚ÄòAnnotatedFeature‚Äô

  • saved_query_id (int, optional) ‚Äì SavedQuery.id of the query, (typical usage), defaults to None

  • task_run_id (int, optional) ‚Äì The TaskRun.id, defaults to None

  • username (str, optional) ‚Äì The username of the user running the task, defaults to None

  • correction_type (str, optional) ‚Äì The CorrectionType to pass to the Query (e.g. SR, LTR), defaults to None

  • exclude_na_metadata_samples (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to exclude samples that have na values for their metadata columns, defaults to False

  • exclude_na_metadata_columns (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to exclude metadata columns that have na values, defaults to False

  • output_dir (str, optional) ‚Äì Output directory for function, defaults to None

  • db_env (str, optional) ‚Äì Database environment, ‚ÄòPROD‚Äô,‚ÄôBETA‚Äô,‚ÄôTEST‚Äô, defaults to None

  • db_session (object, optional) ‚Äì Database session, defaults to None

  • execution_date (DateTime.DateTime, optional) ‚Äì Datetime of execution, defaults to None

  • columns_to_exclude (list, optional) ‚Äì Which columns to exclude, defaults to None

  • exclude_one_factor_columns (bool, optional) ‚Äì Exclude columns with only one factor, defaults to False

  • columns_to_include (list, optional) ‚Äì Which columns to include, defaults to None

  • class_level (str, optional) ‚Äì Query Aggregration class level (for Compounds), defaults to None

  • class_type (str, optional) ‚Äì Query Aggregration class type, defaults to None

  • only_harmonised_metadata (bool, optional) ‚Äì Only include harmonised metadata fields, defaults to False

  • only_metadata (bool, optional) ‚Äì Only include metadata fields, defaults to False

  • scaling (str, optional) ‚Äì Which scaling to use, ‚Äòpa‚Äô, ‚Äòuv‚Äô, ‚Äòmed‚Äô, defaults to None

  • transform (str, optional) ‚Äì Which transformation to use, ‚Äòlog‚Äô, ‚Äòsqrt‚Äô, defaults to None

  • reload_cache (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to reload the cache for the Query, defaults to False

  • validate (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to validate the Task by running the validate() method, defaults to True

  • aggregate_function (str, optional) ‚Äì Which Query aggregration function to use (mean, median, sum, avg), defaults to None

  • harmonise_annotations (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to use harmonised annotations, defaults to False

  • upstream_task_run_id (int, optional) ‚Äì The upstream TaskRun.id, defaults to None

  • exclude_samples_with_na_feature_values (bool, optional) ‚Äì Exclude samples with na feature values, defaults to False

  • include_metadata (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to include metadata or not, defaults to False

  • exclude_features_with_na_feature_values (bool, optional) ‚Äì Exclude features with na feature values, defaults to False

  • include_default_columns (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to include default columns, defaults to True

  • include_harmonised_metadata (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to include harmonised metadata, defaults to True

  • drop_sample_column (bool, optional) ‚Äì Drop the sample column, defaults to False

  • exclude_features_not_in_all_projects (bool, optional) ‚Äì Exclude features not in all projects, defaults to False

  • sample_types (list, optional) ‚Äì SampleTypes to include (StudySample, StudyReference, ExternalReference), defaults to None

  • assay_roles (list, optional) ‚Äì AssayRoles to include (Assay, LinearityReference, PrecisionReference), defaults to None

  • pipeline_run_id (int, optional) ‚Äì The TaskRun.pipeline_run_id, defaults to None

save_results()ÔÉÅ

Save the results into HarmonisedAnnotatedFeature database table

class phenomedb.analysis.RunNPYCReport(username=None, task_run_id=None, db_env=None, db_session=None, execution_date=None, saved_query_id=None, correction_type=None, report_name=None, comment=None, samples_to_exclude=None, exclude_on='Run Order', exclusion_comments=None, reload_cache=False, scaling=None, aggregate_function=None, class_level=None, transform=None, class_type=None, saved_query_model='AnnotatedFeature', harmonise_annotations=False, upstream_task_run_id=None, exclude_features_not_in_all_projects=False, sample_types=None, assay_roles=None, pipeline_run_id=None)ÔÉÅ

Run a nPYc report.

Parameters:

  • report_name (str) ‚Äì The report nPYc report to run, from :link:`https://npyc-toolbox.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reports.html`

  • query_factory (phenomedb.query_factory.QueryFactory, optional) ‚Äì QueryFactory, a handle to the phenomedb.query_factory.QueryFactory object that defined the cohort, defaults to None

  • saved_query_model (str, optional) ‚Äì The output model of the query, defaults to ‚ÄòAnnotatedFeature‚Äô

  • saved_query_id (int, optional) ‚Äì SavedQuery.id of the query, (typical usage), defaults to None

  • task_run_id (int, optional) ‚Äì The TaskRun.id, defaults to None

  • username (str, optional) ‚Äì The username of the user running the task, defaults to None

  • correction_type (str, optional) ‚Äì The CorrectionType to pass to the Query (e.g. SR, LTR), defaults to None

  • exclude_na_metadata_samples (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to exclude samples that have na values for their metadata columns, defaults to False

  • exclude_na_metadata_columns (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to exclude metadata columns that have na values, defaults to False

  • output_dir (str, optional) ‚Äì Output directory for function, defaults to None

  • db_env (str, optional) ‚Äì Database environment, ‚ÄòPROD‚Äô,‚ÄôBETA‚Äô,‚ÄôTEST‚Äô, defaults to None

  • db_session (object, optional) ‚Äì Database session, defaults to None

  • exclude_one_factor_columns (bool, optional) ‚Äì Exclude columns with only one factor, defaults to False

  • columns_to_include (list, optional) ‚Äì Which columns to include, defaults to None

  • class_level (str, optional) ‚Äì Query Aggregration class level (for Compounds), defaults to None

  • class_type (str, optional) ‚Äì Query Aggregration class type, defaults to None

  • only_harmonised_metadata (bool, optional) ‚Äì Only include harmonised metadata fields, defaults to False

  • only_metadata (bool, optional) ‚Äì Only include metadata fields, defaults to False

  • scaling (str, optional) ‚Äì Which scaling to use, ‚Äòpa‚Äô, ‚Äòuv‚Äô, ‚Äòmed‚Äô, defaults to None

  • transform (str, optional) ‚Äì Which transformation to use, ‚Äòlog‚Äô, ‚Äòsqrt‚Äô, defaults to None

  • reload_cache (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to reload the cache for the Query, defaults to False

  • validate (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to validate the Task by running the validate() method, defaults to True

  • aggregate_function (str, optional) ‚Äì Which Query aggregration function to use (mean, median, sum, avg), defaults to None

  • harmonise_annotations (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to use harmonised annotations, defaults to False

  • upstream_task_run_id (int, optional) ‚Äì The upstream TaskRun.id, defaults to None

  • exclude_samples_with_na_feature_values (bool, optional) ‚Äì Exclude samples with na feature values, defaults to False

  • include_metadata (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to include metadata or not, defaults to False

  • exclude_features_with_na_feature_values (bool, optional) ‚Äì Exclude features with na feature values, defaults to False

  • include_default_columns (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to include default columns, defaults to True

  • include_harmonised_metadata (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to include harmonised metadata, defaults to True

  • drop_sample_column (bool, optional) ‚Äì Drop the sample column, defaults to False

  • exclude_features_not_in_all_projects (bool, optional) ‚Äì Exclude features not in all projects, defaults to False

run_analysis()ÔÉÅ

Runs the analysis. Override this method

class phenomedb.analysis.RunPCA(max_components=10, scaling=None, transform=None, minQ2=0.05, username=None, task_run_id=None, db_env=None, harmonise_annotations=True, db_session=None, execution_date=None, query_factory=None, saved_query_id=None, correction_type=None, reload_cache=False, validate=True, saved_query_model='AnnotatedFeature', class_level=None, class_type=None, aggregate_function=None, upstream_task_run_id=None, include_harmonised_metadata=True, exclude_features_not_in_all_projects=True, sample_types=None, assay_roles=None, pipeline_run_id=None)ÔÉÅ

RunPCA. Run a PCA using the pyChemometrics PCA function.

Scaling is done by ChemometricsScaler() as part of the model, NOT the QueryFactory Scaler

Uses SampleType masks. Masks can be specified if required.

Parameters:

  • max_components (int, optional_run) ‚Äì The max number of Principle Components, defaults to 10

  • scaling (str, optional) ‚Äì Which kind of scaling to use, ‚Äòmc‚Äô: mean-centred, ‚Äòuv‚Äô: univariate, ‚Äòpa‚Äô: pareto. defaults to ‚Äòuv‚Äô

  • minQ2 (float, optional) ‚Äì minQ2 for number of PC optimisation, defaults to 0.05

  • query_factory (phenomedb.query_factory.AnnotatedFeatureFactory, optional) ‚Äì The AnnotatedFeatureFactory object to load results from, defaults to None

  • saved_query_id (int, optional) ‚Äì The ID of the SavedQuery to load results from, defaults to None

  • annotations_only (bool, optional) ‚Äì Use only those annotated_features with annotations, defaults to False

  • upstream_task_run_id (int) ‚Äì The Upstream Task Run ID

  • task_run_id (float, optional) ‚Äì The TaskRun ID

  • username (str, optional) ‚Äì The username of the user running the job, defaults to None

  • db_env (str, optional) ‚Äì The db_env to use, ‚ÄòPROD‚Äô or ‚ÄòTEST‚Äô, default ‚ÄòPROD‚Äô

  • db_session (object, optional) ‚Äì The db_session to use

  • execution_date (str, optional) ‚Äì The date of execution, str format.

  • validate (boolean) ‚Äì Whether to run validation, default True

  • pipeline_run_id (str, optional) ‚Äì The Pipeline run ID

run_analysis()ÔÉÅ

Run the PCA analysis using the specified options.

class phenomedb.analysis.RunPCPR2(query_factory=None, saved_query_id=None, username=None, task_run_id=None, pct_threshold=0.95, db_env=None, db_session=None, execution_date=None, exclude_na_metadata_samples=True, exclude_na_metadata_columns=True, columns_to_exclude=None, columns_to_include=None, scaling=None, transform=None, only_harmonised_metadata=True, reload_cache=False, only_metadata=False, include_metadata=False, assay_roles=None, correction_type=None, aggregate_function=None, class_level=None, class_type=None, saved_query_model='AnnotatedFeature', sample_types=None, pipeline_run_id=None, harmonise_annotations=True, upstream_task_run_id=None, include_harmonised_metadata=True, exclude_features_not_in_all_projects=True)ÔÉÅ

Run a PCPR2 analysis. Uses the R package PCPR2 under the hood :link:`https://github.com/JoeRothwell/pcpr2`

Parameters:

  • pct_threshold (float, optional) ‚Äì _description_, defaults to 0.95

  • query_factory (phenomedb.query_factory.QueryFactory, optional) ‚Äì QueryFactory, a handle to the phenomedb.query_factory.QueryFactory object that defined the cohort, defaults to None

  • saved_query_model (str, optional) ‚Äì The output model of the query, defaults to ‚ÄòAnnotatedFeature‚Äô

  • saved_query_id (int, optional) ‚Äì SavedQuery.id of the query, (typical usage), defaults to None

  • task_run_id (int, optional) ‚Äì The TaskRun.id, defaults to None

  • username (str, optional) ‚Äì The username of the user running the task, defaults to None

  • correction_type (str, optional) ‚Äì The CorrectionType to pass to the Query (e.g. SR, LTR), defaults to None

  • exclude_na_metadata_samples (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to exclude samples that have na values for their metadata columns, defaults to False

  • exclude_na_metadata_columns (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to exclude metadata columns that have na values, defaults to False

  • output_dir (str, optional) ‚Äì Output directory for function, defaults to None

  • db_env (str, optional) ‚Äì Database environment, ‚ÄòPROD‚Äô,‚ÄôBETA‚Äô,‚ÄôTEST‚Äô, defaults to None

  • db_session (object, optional) ‚Äì Database session, defaults to None

  • execution_date (DateTime.DateTime, optional) ‚Äì Datetime of execution, defaults to None

  • columns_to_exclude (list, optional) ‚Äì Which columns to exclude, defaults to None

  • exclude_one_factor_columns (bool, optional) ‚Äì Exclude columns with only one factor, defaults to False

  • columns_to_include (list, optional) ‚Äì Which columns to include, defaults to None

  • class_level (str, optional) ‚Äì Query Aggregration class level (for Compounds), defaults to None

  • class_type (str, optional) ‚Äì Query Aggregration class type, defaults to None

  • only_harmonised_metadata (bool, optional) ‚Äì Only include harmonised metadata fields, defaults to False

  • only_metadata (bool, optional) ‚Äì Only include metadata fields, defaults to False

  • scaling (str, optional) ‚Äì Which scaling to use, ‚Äòpa‚Äô, ‚Äòuv‚Äô, ‚Äòmed‚Äô, defaults to None

  • transform (str, optional) ‚Äì Which transformation to use, ‚Äòlog‚Äô, ‚Äòsqrt‚Äô, defaults to None

  • reload_cache (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to reload the cache for the Query, defaults to False

  • validate (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to validate the Task by running the validate() method, defaults to True

  • aggregate_function (str, optional) ‚Äì Which Query aggregration function to use (mean, median, sum, avg), defaults to None

  • harmonise_annotations (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to use harmonised annotations, defaults to False

  • upstream_task_run_id (int, optional) ‚Äì The upstream TaskRun.id, defaults to None

  • exclude_samples_with_na_feature_values (bool, optional) ‚Äì Exclude samples with na feature values, defaults to False

  • include_metadata (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to include metadata or not, defaults to False

  • exclude_features_with_na_feature_values (bool, optional) ‚Äì Exclude features with na feature values, defaults to False

  • include_default_columns (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to include default columns, defaults to True

  • include_harmonised_metadata (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to include harmonised metadata, defaults to True

  • drop_sample_column (bool, optional) ‚Äì Drop the sample column, defaults to False

  • exclude_features_not_in_all_projects (bool, optional) ‚Äì Exclude features not in all projects, defaults to False

  • sample_types (list, optional) ‚Äì SampleTypes to include (StudySample, StudyReference, ExternalReference), defaults to None

  • assay_roles (list, optional) ‚Äì AssayRoles to include (Assay, LinearityReference, PrecisionReference), defaults to None

  • pipeline_run_id (int, optional) ‚Äì The TaskRun.pipeline_run_id, defaults to None
